mapper.select: SELECT a.Code, a.Name, a.SPECS, b.Name AS UnitName, b1.Code AS UnitCode, e.Code AS CategoryCode FROM dbo.CBO_ItemMaster a INNER JOIN dbo.Base_UOM_Trl b ON a.InventorySecondUOM= b.ID INNER JOIN dbo.Base_UOM b1 ON a.InventorySecondUOM= b1.ID INNER JOIN dbo.CBO_ItemMaster_Trl c ON a.ID= c.ID INNER JOIN dbo.Base_Organization d ON d.ID= a.Org INNER JOIN dbo.CBO_Category e ON a.MainItemCategory= e.ID WHERE a.Effective_IsEffective = 1 AND d.Code= '001'
